column2: The Oxford Tolkien Society''' is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] in England.

column1: Taruithorn was founded in 1990<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/index.html|articlename=Homepage|website=[http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/index.html Taruithorn]|accessed=20-06-2015}}</ref> in Oxford
column2: England. It is both a [[Tolkien Society]] smial as well as an independent Tolkien society for students of Oxford University.

column1: Taruithorn events are organized around the academic term.<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/termcard.html|articlename=Termcard|website=[http://users.ox.ac.uk/~tolksoc/index.html Taruithorn]|accessed=20-06-2015}}</ref>
Taruithorn publishes its magazine ''Miruvor'' on an irregular basis.
